lines.text: I'm afraid you have me at a disadvantage.

[Suggestively]
That's the way to have any man.

[after seeing Zanini collapse]
Somebody get a doctor! Is there a doctor in the house>

[Coming out of the crowd]
I'm a doctor.
You're a doctor? See what you can do for him.

[after examining him briefly]
There's nothing I can do for him. The man's dead!

[Seeing Sweeney helping himself to liquor]
Who asked you to have a drink?

[Trying to intimidate him]
Where wee you on the night of January?
If I hadn't lost my badge, i'd turn it in.
